headline: Morgan Stanley rates RIO as Equal-weight

headline: Gauge of EM Currencies Rises as Dollar Slips on Thin Trading
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A gauge for emerging-market currencies gained as President Donald Trump’s move to extend a deadline for aggressive tariffs on the European Union bolstered risk appetite, in a session marked by thin trading volumes due to holidays in the US and the UK.Most Read from BloombergNY Private School Pleads for Donors to Stay Open After Declaring BankruptcyUAE’s AI University Aims to Become Stanford of the GulfNYC’s War on Trash Gets a Glam SquadPacific Coast Highway to Reopen Near Malibu

headline: Jefferies Financial Presents Unique Upside Case For Holding, Despite Market Headwinds
summary: Jefferies' balance sheet risk is modest, with healthy credit ratings and conservative leverage, adding confidence for long-term investors. Learn more on JEF stock here.
